about_the_game:
Push blocks, build words, and duck with your friends. Stack challenges to buy upgrades and improve your chances in this word action roguelike. Quack, waddle, and unleash the chaos of ducks!



Super Spelling Ducks is a real-time run-based ("roguelike") word-building game where you control ducks to push around letters.

DEMO DROPPING THIS WEEK!


All ducks crave bread, but no bread is more desirable than the golden loaf! Unfortunately, some badgers have stolen it, and demand you pay them gems to get it! The gems are stuck inside letter blocks, but only your spelling skills (and your magical quack powers) can break the blocks open.

DEMO DROPPING THIS WEEK!


Along the way you will be given the opportunity to purchase upgrades such as extra letters, blank letters, new abilities such as jumping and pulling, new tile types, assistance with making words, and many more.

DEMO DROPPING THIS WEEK!


While making words gives you some money to afford these upgrades, you'll also need to take on challenges to get more funds. Some of the challenges include dirty letter blocks, lots of extra letters (but they're all Qs), infinitely cloning letters, moles that push letters around, ballpit balls, moles that bomb your letters, sticky letters, and letters that just really don't want to be pushed!



Super Spelling Ducks also supports multiplayer - flock with up to four ducks! Help each other to make lots of words and reach new high scores! Just try not to squash each other too much!

FEATURES


  • Action-packed chaotic roguelike word-building.
  • Single player and local co-operative multiplayer.
  • A new graphical overhaul coming soon!
  • Extra game modes, like Quackdown - clear the board of letters by making words before you get overwhelmed!
  • Different upgrades and curses to unlock.
  • Lots and lots of ducks. Obviously you can put hats on them as well!
  • Friendly accessibility features - we want to be the word game for people who don't like word games! (But also for people who do!)

(DEMO DROPPING THIS WEEK!)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3+ or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Catalina
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Super Spelling Ducks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3+ or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
